Binance rolls out Web3 Loan inside Binance Wallet

@Binance has launched Web3 Loan directly within @BinanceWallet, allowing users to borrow crypto on-chain without leaving the wallet or giving up self-custody.

What‚Äôs new
‚Ä¢On-chain borrowing inside Binance Wallet (Web3 Earn tab)
‚Ä¢Use existing assets as collateral (starting with @VenusProtocol on @BNBChain)
‚Ä¢No need to connect external dApps or sell holdings
‚Ä¢Designed to ease CeFi users into DeFi lending
‚Ä¢Launch promo includes a 400,000 USDT reward pool for eligible users

This is a notable step toward making DeFi lending more accessible at scale, blending self-custody with a familiar Binance UX and lower-fee BNB Chain infrastructure.

üëâ Official announcement: https://t.co/G07vKmLNIM

Strong rejection from the supply zone followed by a sharp drop, now price is reacting from a demand area ‚Äî $BNB 

After the impulsive sell-off, buyers stepped in near support and price is attempting a short-term recovery. This bounce looks corrective for now, and the reaction around the marked zone will decide continuation. If price holds above support, a move toward the imbalance area is possible. Failure to hold will open room for another downside leg.

Target: 846 ‚Äì 852

$BNB  is still trading under major resistance and a broader corrective structure. The recent move from 818 is a relief bounce, not a confirmed trend reversal. Price has now reached a strong supply zone around 850‚Äì855, where sellers have already shown interest. Volume on the bounce is moderate but not strong enough to confirm continuation. Multiple rejections near the same zone suggest distribution rather than accumulation. As long as $BNB  fails to break and hold above 865, downside risk remains higher than upside.  From a market perspective, sentiment across large caps remains cautious, and BNB is moving in sync with broader market weakness. This favors fade trades at resistance instead of chasing upside.  Support Zones: ‚Ä¢ 838 ‚Äì 835 (intraday support) ‚Ä¢ 820 ‚Äì 818 (major demand zone) Resistance Zones: ‚Ä¢ 848 ‚Äì 855 (active sell zone) ‚Ä¢ 865 ‚Äì 875 (trend invalidation zone) Pullback Zone for Shorts: Any rejection, wick, or slowdown between 848 ‚Äì 855 is a valid short entry. Failure to reclaim 855 opens the door for a move back toward 828 and 818. Trade with structure, not emotion. If you‚Äôre not following Token Talk, you‚Äôre making a mistake. #BNB  #cryptocurrency
